name.hi: पॉपी प्लेटाइम अध्याय 3 अनब्लॉक किया गया
name.ja: ポッピープレイタイム 第3章 アンブロックされました
name.ko: 팝피 플레이타임 챕터 3 차단 해제 됨
name.th: Poppy Playtime บทที่ 3 ปลดล็อคแล้ว
name.vi: Poppy Playtime Chương 3 Đã Mở Khóa
name.zh_CN: Poppy Playtime 第3章 解锁
name.zh_TW: Poppy Playtime 第3章 解鎖

short.ar: استكشف عالم الأشباح لهاغي واغي في الفصل 3 من بوبي بلايتايم. كن ذكياً وتغلب على اللعبة اللعينة وابتعد عن قبضتها!
short.am: ሀምጥ ያለ የተቀማጡ ዋይታ ያለው በፖፕይ ፓሌቲም ሻ፭ ውስጥ ቅርብ እንደሚረሱ ተያይዞ የተወሰነ የባህል ውብ ቃል እና እንቅስቃሴውን በማሰብ ነፃ ያለውን እውቀት ለመታደግ እርስዎን ይጠብቁ!
short.bg: Изследвайте омайния свят на Хъги Въги в Глава 3 на Poppy Playtime. Преодолейте зловещата играчка и избягайте от нея!
short.bn: পপি প্লেটাইমের অধ্যায় 3 এ হাগি হাগির ভূতের বিশ্ব অন্বেষণ করুন। মানুষের ছাত্রত্ব করুন এবং এর আঘাত থেকে মুক্তি পান!
short.ca: Explora el món encantat de Huggy Wuggy al Capítol 3 de Poppy Playtime. Supera l'espelma sinistra i escapa del seu agafament!
short.cs: Prozkoumejte zatuchlý svět Huggy Wuggy v kapitole 3 Poppy Playtime. Přehrajte hrozivou hračku a unikněte jí!
short.da: Udforsk den hjemsøgte verden af Huggy Wuggy i Poppy Playtime Kapitel 3. Outsmart den syndige legetøj og undslip dens greb!
short.de: Erkunde die geheimnisvolle Welt von Huggy Wuggy im Kapitel 3 von Poppy Playtime. Überliste das finstere Spielzeug und entkomme…
short.el: Εξερευνήστε το στοιχειωμένο κόσμο του Huggy Wuggy στο Κεφάλαιο 3 του Poppy Playtime. Ξεπεράστε το αμαρτωλό παιχνίδι και ξεφύγετε…
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Explore the haunted world of Huggy Wuggy in Poppy Playtime Chapter 3. Outsmart the sinister toy and escape its grasp!
short.es,es_419: Explora el mundo embrujado de Huggy Wuggy en el Capítulo 3 de Poppy Playtime. ¡Burla al juguete siniestro y escapa de su agarre!
short.et: Uurige kummituslikku maailma Huggy Wuggy's Poppy Playtime peatükis 3. Tehke nutikalt sinist mänguasja ja põgenege selle haardest!
short.fa: در ماجرای Poppy Playtime بخش ۳ دنیای وحشتناک Huggy Wuggy را کاوش کنید. از اسباب بازی شیطانی هوشمند بازی کنید و از دست‌انداز آن فرار…
short.fi: Tutustu Huggy Wuggyn kummitusmaailmaan Poppy Playtime -luvussa 3. Älykäs paholainen lelu ja paeta sen otteesta!
short.fil: Tuklasin ang nakakatakot na mundo ni Huggy Wuggy sa Kabanata 3 ng Poppy Playtime. Labanan ang nakakasindak na laruan at makatakas…
short.fr: Explorez le monde hanté de Huggy Wuggy dans le Chapitre 3 de Poppy Playtime. Déjouez le sinistre jouet et échappez à son emprise !
short.gu: પોપી પ્લેટાઇમ ચાપ્ટર 3 માં હાગી હાગીની ભાવનાત્મક વિશ્વને અન્વેષણ કરો. ડુબકારો વિના નાના ખેલો અને તેના અટકાવથી બચાવો!
short.he: גלה את עולמה המזועזע של האגי ווגי בפרק 3 של פופי פלייטיים. נתק את הצעצוע המרושע וברח ממעצוריו!
short.hi: पॉपी प्लेटाइम अध्याय 3 में हगी वगी की प्रेतात्मक दुनिया का अन्वेषण करें। खतरनाक खिलौने को चतुराई से परास्त करें और उसके जाल से बचें!
short.hr: Istražite ukleti svijet Huggy Wuggy-a u Poglavlju 3 Poppy Playtime-a. Prevarite zlokobnu igračku i pobjegnite iz njezinog stiska!
short.hu: Fedezd fel Huggy Wuggy kísérteties világát a Poppy Playtime 3. fejezetében. Húzd le az álnok játékot, és szabadulj ki a markából!
short.id: Jelajahi dunia berhantu Huggy Wuggy di Bab 3 Poppy Playtime. Kelabui mainan jahat dan hindari genggamannya!
short.it: Esplora il mondo infestato di Huggy Wuggy nel Capitolo 3 di Poppy Playtime. Sconfiggi il sinistro giocattolo e sfuggi alla sua…
short.ja: ポッピープレイタイムの第3章でHuggy Wuggyの呪われた世界を探検してください。悪意のあるおもちゃを出し抜いて、その掌から逃れてください！
short.kn: ಪಾಪಿ ಪ್ಲೇಟೈಮ್ ಅಧ್ಯಾಯ 3 ನಲ್ಲಿ ಹಗ್ಗಿ ವಗ್ಗಿಯ ಭೂತಪ್ರೇತವನ್ನು ಅನ್ವೇಷಿಸಿ. ಅಪರಿಚಿತ ಟಾಯ್‌ನನ್ನು ಮಿತವಾಗಿ ಕೊಲ್ಲಿ ಮತ್ತು ಅದರ ಹಿಡಿತದಿಂದ ಬಿಡಿ!
short.ko: 팝피 플레이타임 챕터 3에서 허기 웨기의 저주받은 세계를 탐험하세요. 사악한 장난감을 속여서 그 손아귀에서 벗어나세요!
short.lt: Tyrinėkite Huggy Wuggy užburto pasaulio Poppy Playtime 3 skyrių. Apgaulingas pabaisos ir pabėkite nuo jo!
short.lv: Izpētiet Huggy Wuggy apburtās pasaules Poppy Playtime 3. nodaļu. Apgāžiet negantīgo rotaļlietu un izbēdziet no tās sajūgā!
short.ml: പോപ്പി പ്ലേയ്‌റൈം ചാപ്റ്റർ 3 സംരംഭിക്കുന്ന ഹഗ്ഗി വഗ്ഗിയുടെ ഭൂതപ്രപഞ്ചം അന്വേഷിക്കുക. അപരിചിത ടോയിനെ മാരുത്തുക മറ്റുള്ളവരെ അതിലേക്ക്…
short.mr: पॉपी प्लेटाईमच्या अध्याय 3 मध्ये हग्गी वग्गीची भूतस्थळ शोधा. शैतानिक खिळवणारे खिलौने फर्याद करा आणि त्याच्या पडद्यातून बघा!
short.ms: Terokai dunia berhantu Huggy Wuggy di Bab 3 Poppy Playtime. Mengatasi mainan yang berdosa dan luput daripada cengkaman!
short.nl: Verken de spookachtige wereld van Huggy Wuggy in Hoofdstuk 3 van Poppy Playtime. Slim de sinistere speelgoed en ontsnap aan zijn…
short.no: Utforsk den hjemsøkte verdenen til Huggy Wuggy i Poppy Playtime Kapittel 3. Forbli den onde leken og unnslippe dens grep!
short.pl: Odkryj nawiedzony świat Huggy Wuggy w Rozdziale 3 Poppy Playtime. Prześmiesz złośliwą zabawkę i ucieknij od jej chwytu!
short.pt_BR: Explore o mundo assombrado de Huggy Wuggy no Capítulo 3 de Poppy Playtime. Ultrapasse o brinquedo sinistro e escape de seu domínio!
short.pt_PT: Explore o mundo assombrado de Huggy Wuggy no Capítulo 3 de Poppy Playtime. Ultrapasse o brinquedo sinistro e escape do seu domínio!
short.ro: Explorează lumea bântuită a lui Huggy Wuggy în Capitolul 3 din Poppy Playtime. Învinge jucăria sinistră și scapă din mâinile sale!
short.ru: Исследуйте оккультный мир Huggy Wuggy в Главе 3 Poppy Playtime. Обойдите коварную игрушку и избавьтесь от ее хватки!
short.sk: Preskúmajte strašidelný svet Huggy Wuggy v kapitole 3 Poppy Playtime. Pretrepte zlomyseľnú hračku a uniknite jej úchytom!
short.sl: Raziščite obdajajoči svet Huggy Wuggy v poglavju 3 igre Poppy Playtime. Zmagovalno premagajte zloveščo igračo in se ji izmuznite iz…
short.sr: Istražite ukleti svet Huggy Wuggy-a u Poglavlju 3 Poppy Playtime-a. Prevarite zlokobnu igračku i pobegnite iz njenog stiska!
short.sv: Utforska den hemsökta världen av Huggy Wuggy i Kapitel 3 av Poppy Playtime. Överlista det ondskefulla leksaket och fly från dess…
short.sw: Chunguza ulimwengu wa kutisha wa Huggy Wuggy katika Sura ya 3 ya Poppy Playtime. Zuiliza kipande cha mchezo cha kikatili na ukimbie…
short.ta: பாபி ப்ளேடைம் அதிகாரம் 3-யில் ஹக்கி வக்கியின் பேய்க்கான உலகத்தை ஆராய்ந்துகொள்ளுங்கள். கெட்ட கைப்பொறியை முன் எதிர்கொள்ளுங்கள்…
short.te: పాపీ ప్లేటైమ్ ఛాప్టర్ 3 లో హగ్గీ వగ్గీ యొక్క భూతపు ప్రపంచాన్ని అన్వేషించండి. అపమానకరంగా గాడిదల గెలిచండి మరియు దాని కడితంలో నుండి…
short.th: สำรวจโลกที่ถูกผีของ Huggy Wuggy ในบทที่ 3 ของ Poppy Playtime ให้แตกความอัจฉริยะเกมตุ๊กตาชั่วร้ายและหนีจากการถือครองของมัน!
short.tr: Poppy Playtime Bölüm 3'te Huggy Wuggy'nin perili dünyasını keşfedin. Günahkar oyuncakla zekice başa çıkın ve kavrayışından kaçın!
short.uk: Досліджуйте проклятий світ Huggy Wuggy в Розділі 3 Poppy Playtime. Обійдіть хитрість злих іграшок і втечіть від їхня захвату!
short.vi: Khám phá thế giới ma ám của Huggy Wuggy trong Chương 3 của Poppy Playtime. Lừa quỷ dữ và thoát khỏi sự nắm giữ của nó!
short.zh_CN: 在Poppy Playtime第3章中探索Huggy Wuggy的闹鬼世界。智胜阴险的玩具，并逃离它的控制！
short.zh_TW: 在Poppy Playtime第3章中探索Huggy Wuggy的闹鬼世界。智胜邪恶的玩具，并逃离其掌控！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prepare yourself for the thrilling conclusion to the Poppy Playtime saga with Chapter 3: Huggy Wuggy. Delve deeper into the twisted world of Playtime Co. as you uncover the dark secrets hidden within its walls.

In this heart-pounding installment, players will once again step into the shoes of [Main Character], who is determined to confront the malevolent force behind the haunting toys of Playtime Co. Armed with only your wits and a handful of makeshift tools, you must navigate through treacherous corridors and solve intricate puzzles to unravel the mysteries that lie ahead.

But beware, for the malevolent Poppy Playtime dolls are more cunning and relentless than ever before. Prepare to face new challenges and adversaries as you inch closer to the heart of the factory. Will you uncover the truth behind Poppy's sinister designs, or will you become just another plaything in her twisted game?

Immerse yourself in a chilling atmosphere brought to life by stunning visuals and spine-tingling sound design. Explore meticulously crafted environments filled with secrets waiting to be unearthed. With each step forward, the tension mounts, leading to a climactic showdown that will test your courage and determination.

Poppy Playtime Chapter 3: The Final Showdown is a gripping conclusion to an unforgettable horror experience. Are you ready to confront your fears and discover the truth lurking within the shadows? The fate of Playtime Co. rests in your hands.

HOW TO PLAY
You can play with W-A-S-D, arrow keys and mouse or trackpad.

HOW TO INSTALL
Click download this Extension using the "Add to Chrome" button.

Once the game has finished loading, simply select the "Extensions Icon" button. 

After clicking this, you'll be directed to the playground area, where the game "Poppy Playtime Chapter 3 - Huggy Wuggy" will launch automatically. All that's left is to press the play button and start enjoying the game.
